verbs.description: The GOP [V: is] abandoning policy goals that used to define the party , and replacing them with raw Trumpism .
[ARG0: The GOP] is [V: abandoning] [ARG1: policy goals that used to define the party] , and replacing them with raw Trumpism .

[ARG0: The GOP] is abandoning policy goals that used to define the party , and [V: replacing] [ARG1: them] [ARG2: with raw Trumpism] .
